item.title: Prometheus Label Bookmarklet
item.author: Author
item.description: One of the most recent projects I’ve been involved with at work has been the exploration of Prometheus as a metrics and monitoring tool. I expect as I spend more time with the tooling I’ll probably be writing more posts, mostly in the “TIL” vain. Today, however, is not one of those posts. Instead, I wanted to show off a few lines of code I put together which I’ve found pretty useful when setting up our scrape configs.
